body:
I assume that TRT doesn't support transpose at batch dim, then we need to make sure `weights_ptr[0] == 0` and return error if not. And please add corresponding test cases.

We need the same check in `TransposeTensor()` (also see my below comment for letting it return a `Status`).
body_html:
